summary: Veterinary case management app with voice note parsing for 9 case fields
architectural_notes: App has two separate pages: Dashboard and Cases page
Case management system with 9 fields including MRN, Pet Name, and Arrival Date
Voice note parsing functionality for case field population

existing_features.title: Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) when Dashboard page loads, while preserving the existing manual sort control functionality
Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) when Cases page loads, while preserving the existing manual sort control functionality
Increase the font size of the MRN (Medical Record Number) field in case cards on the Dashboard page
Increase the font size of the MRN (Medical Record Number) field in case list items on the Cases page

new_feature_requests.summary: Default sort by Arrival Date (Oldest First) on Dashboard and Cases pages with manual sorting option
Increase MRN font size in case cards/lists on Dashboard and Cases pages

projectName: Default sort by Arrival Date and increase MRN font size
